mapper.delete: delete from tblorder_history where order_id = order_id
mapper.select:
select
from tblorder_history
and act_type != #{actTypeSecond} and cur_status_id IN (#{curStatusReceive},#{curStatusBack},#{curStatusUnBack})

select count(1) from tblorder_history
and cur_status_id IN (#{curStatusReceive},#{curStatusBack},#{curStatusUnBack})
mapper.update: update tblorder_history set sin_status_id = '0332',sin_status_nm = #{sinStatusNm},modify_time=now() where order_id IN #{updateItem1} and modify_time<now()

update tblorder_history set sin_status_id = '0350',sin_status_nm = #{sinStatusNm},goodsaskfor_flag = '1' where order_id IN

mapper.select: select count(1) from tblorder_history

SELECT count(1) from ( select order_id from tblorder_history
limit 0, 20000 ) ordercounts
select count(1) from tblorder_history
select count(1) from tblorder_history

SELECT
from tblorder_history where ordermain_id=#{ordermainId} and del_flag = 0

SELECT
from tblorder_history
and order_id = #{orderId} and cardno = #{cardno}
and (create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}) and ordertype_id <> 'JF' and ( miaosha_action_flag!=9999 or miaosha_action_flag is null )
order by create_time desc
